meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the nucleus of an atom.
meanings.sent1: The subnuclear particles are tiny and located inside the atom's core.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the subnuclear components to understand atomic structure.
meanings.sent3: The subnuclear secrets of the atom were finally revealed by the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of subnuclear physics was as deep as the atom itself.
meanings.sent5: The subnuclear realm is a mysterious world within the atom.

meanings.definition: Relating to or existing within a smaller unit than the nucleus of an atom.
meanings.sent1: The subnuclear particles interact at a level deeper than the nucleus.
meanings.sent2: Chemists explore subnuclear forces to understand atomic interactions.
meanings.sent3: The subnuclear mysteries kept the scientists intrigued for years.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts delved into subnuclear realms beyond the nucleus.
meanings.sent5: The subnuclear level of detail revealed new insights into atomic structure.
